author: Olivia Kelly
title: Public urged to stop throwing used masks and gloves on the ground
description: Litter increasing coronavirus risks Dublin City Council has said
content:
Dublin City Council has urged the public not to increase the risk of spreading coronavirus by throwing used disposable gloves and masks on the ground.
Certain parts of the city have seen a marked increase in the amount of gloves and masks being littered by p… [+1114 chars]
